shared.model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    The Catan Game all collected is represented in this class This is the model's main container

      • nextTurnPhase

        public void nextTurnPhase()
        advances to the next phase in this player's turn
        Pre-Conditions
        this turn phase is finished
        Post-Conditions
        the next turn phase is entered. If that means another player should become the active player, that player becomes so.

      • endTurn

        public void endTurn()
        advances the turn to the next player
        Pre-Conditions
        the player is finished with his turn
        Post-Conditions
        it is the next player's turn

      • applyDiceRoll

        public void applyDiceRoll(int result)
        Pre-Conditions
        the active player has rolled the dice in turn and achieved this result
        Post-Conditions
        players recieve resources and are forced to discard if they have too many resources., if the player rolled a 7, they are put into the ROB phase of their turn.
